document.full_text: the hit musicals "the book of mormon" and revival of "anything goes" each won five drama desk awards on monday, bolstering their front-runner status going into next month's tony awards, broadway's top honors.
document.title: "book of mormon", "anything goes" top drama desk awards
lines_and_colors: the hit musicals "the book of mormon" and revival of "anything goes" each won five drama desk awards on monday, bolstering their front-runner status going into next month's tony awards, broadway's top honors.
